title: Waiver Wire! Adrian Peterson? Really??? Who Else is Available? (11/02 Fantasy Football Podcast)
description:
Dave and Jamey will approach Adrian Peterson very differently and give you opposite takes on the veteran RB. Is Boston Scott a better option, and should you just pivot to a different position on waivers this week? We talk at length about Peterson and give some buy low RBs (10:00) and our top overall priorities (14:30) including Taysom Hill and DeVante Parker. We also discuss FAB (19:40) ... All of the big news you need to know (23:30) and our top players to add at QB (30:00), RB (30:50), WR (32:30), TE (37:35), DST (38:10) and Kicker. Which Ravens RB do we like? Is Jamison Crowder a good start this week? Is Pat Freiermuth a sleeping giant? ... Recapping Giants-Chiefs (41:00) and wondering if it's time to sit Patrick Mahomes. And we've got the Dropometer (47:30) for Allen Robinson and many more plus a longer look at the waiver wire (50:00) including IDP ... Email us at fantasyfootball@cbsi.com
Follow our FFT team on Twitter: @FFToday, @AdamAizer, @JameyEisenberg, @daverichard, @heathcummingssr, @ctowerscbs, @BenSchragg
Watch FFT on YouTube https://www.youtube.com/fantasyfootballtoday
Join our Facebook group https://www.facebook.com/groups/FantasyFootballToday/
Sign up for the FFT newsletter https://www.cbssports.com/newsletter
You can listen to Fantasy Football Today on your smart speakers! Simply say "Alexa, play the latest episode of the Fantasy Football Today podcast" or "Hey Google, play the latest episode of the Fantasy Football Today podcast."
To hear more from the CBS Sports Podcast Network, visit https://www.cbssports.com/podcasts/

itunes:subtitle: Adrian Peterson or Boston Scott? Taysom Hill or any other waiver wire QB? Plus DeVante Parker, Kenny Golladay, DSTs, Kickers, IDP and what the heck is wrong with the Chiefs!?
